page.title: 01Blindmans Bluff.
page.content: Blind mans Bluff is an old game and is part of the recreation of many children in this area. The rules are that somebody is on and they tie a handkerchief round their eyes so that they can't see where they are going. Somebody else spins them round so they don't know which direction they are facing. The blindfolded person counts to five aloud and the others run and hide in the room.After five seconds the blindfolded person tries to find them. When he finds them he feels their face and if he gets his or her name wrong you shout bluff and run off. When he finds you again and gets your name right you are on with him.
